publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4634 Cathy Jamieson: Compensation Bill - UK Legislationâ€”That the Parliament agrees that the UK Parliament should consider those provisions of the Compensation Bill, introduced in the House of Lords on 2 November 2005, which will legislate in the devolved area of damages law in respect of joint and several liability, as laid out in LCM(S2) 8.1. Supported by: Hugh Henry*
